label: Swimming Pools and Hot Tubs
description: Products and services related to swimming pools and hot tubs.
intents: Buy a swimming pool or hot tub
Find accessories for swimming pools and hot tubs
Repair or maintain a swimming pool or hot tub
Rent a hot tub for an event

subcategories.label: Inflatable Pools and Hot Tubs
subcategories.description: Portable and easy-to-set-up pools and hot tubs that can be inflated and deflated.

subcategories.label: Above Ground Pools
subcategories.description: Pools that are installed above ground level.

subcategories.label: In-Ground Pools
subcategories.description: Pools that are installed in the ground.

subcategories.label: Hot Tubs and Spas
subcategories.description: Small pools of heated water used for relaxation and hydrotherapy.

subcategories.label: Pool and Hot Tub Accessories
subcategories.description: Products and services used to enhance the functionality and enjoyment of swimming pools and hot tubs.

subcategories.label: Pool and Hot Tub Maintenance and Repair
subcategories.description: Services and products used to maintain and repair swimming pools and hot tubs.
